name: MSCRMRestoreOnlineInstance
description: Restores PowerApps/CDS/Dynamcics 365 environment from a previous backup using a timestamp or label
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: ApiUrl
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the Service Url for your environment region as per (documentation)[https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/online-management-api/get-started-online-management-api]

inputs.name: sourceInstanceName
inputs.label: Source Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique instance name. E.g. for :https://contoso.crm.dynamics.com, the value would be: contoso

inputs.name: restoreType
inputs.label: Restore Using
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restore a specific timestamp or use a backup label to retrieve the timestamp

inputs.name: backupLabel
inputs.label: Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: The label of the manual backup to restore. Task will retrieve the last backup using this label and use it's timestamp.

inputs.name: restoreTimestamp
inputs.label: Restore Timestamp (UTC)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The restore time in UTC e.g.: 2020-02-15T20:08:18Z (Must be within backup retention period)

inputs.name: targetInstanceName
inputs.label: Target Instance Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique instance name. E.g. for :https://contoso.crm.dynamics.com, the value would be: contoso

inputs.name: friendlyName
inputs.label: Friendly Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The new friendly name of the instance

inputs.name: securityGroupName
inputs.label: Security Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the security group to be applied to target instance after copy. If Id is provided, this value is not used

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait For Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting this to true will cause the task to wait until the backup completes

inputs.name: sleepDuration
inputs.label: Sleep Duration (seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The frequency to query the status of the backup job while waiting for completion
